testimonials.testimonial:
Throughout our collaboration, Dmitry has consistently demonstrated strong development skills using Google solutions, keen attention to detail, and an unwavering commitment to delivering high-quality results.

Dmitry has effectively managed the developments entrusted to him and resolved complex technical issues, resulting in an efficient solution (robustness, time savings, resource savings) for the company.
I highly recommend Dmitry, who has shown professionalism, expertise, and diligence in the missions carried out within the Data&Robotic team.
testimonials.author: Fabrice Nico
